name: 8BITEARN
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
$8Bit is a hyper-deflationary, BEP-20 native token of the 8BitEARN Ecosystem that opens several passive income streams & benefit portals to incentivize $8Bit token holders. $8Bit Offers perks such as BTC Reflections, Staking Rewards, Monthly Diamond Hand Rewards, Quarterly Revenue Distributions, a BUSD Credit Facility and Investment Insurance at our Launchpad ProPAD, Farming & Cashback Pools at our multi-chain Defi Exchange ProDEX, several DeFi benefits to 8Bit NFT holders with an incredible NFT trading experience at our NFT Marketplace! We promote absolute transparency with integrity & decision rights through DAO Governance.

1) 8BITEARN POWER NFT DAPP PRODEX & PROPAD.
2) Gift - prepaid cards & Next Gen DeFi Exchange
3) xplore an ecosystem, equipped with multiple industry leading DeFi Products and offers numerous passive income streams to users.
4) Earn $8Bit using MySocialVerse platform.

5 ) Buy NFTs using $8Bit tokens.
